Hello again PH families,

If your student needs to take medication during the school hours (7:45-1:30) this semester, you will need to have your Dr. or Healthcare provider fill out a 2020-2021 Pleasant Hill Medication Authorization form.

I cannot give any student any medication (even Tylenol or Advil for headaches) at school per the State of IL without this completed form. This form must be our District specific form so please be sure your Dr‚Äôs office has the correct form with our name on it. This must be signed by your Healthcare provider and a parent/guardian and turned into school when the medication is brought in.

Please note: All medications MUST be brought into school in the original labeled container by a parent/guardian. They cannot be transported to school by a student. We will begin accepting medications Monday, Aug 10th when I return to the building.

Here is the link for the form from our website:

http://www.phill69.com/nurse.html

Thank you for your help and as always, please email me with any questions at nurse@phill69.com.

~Mrs. Naugle
Pleasant Hill School Nurse
